website_summaries.verdict: Multi-functional piece that’s great for smaller spaces.
pros: Natural rattan gives a light, beachy feel
cons: Uneven surface means use of a tray is a must for placing cups and glasses

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this center piece. I would definitely order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Stormy

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: I searched everywhere for a not so typical coffee table. This is super cute, well made, and not too big/heavy. My only complaint is you can't leave glasses straight on the table because the surface is uneven and you can't get crumbs out - if you have kids or a messy husband, I would not recommend. I got a matching tray so that solves the problem of resting drinks and glasses on the table.
customer_reviews.author: noneofyourbusiness

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted but the smell....
customer_reviews.text: This table is just as it looks and is very sturdy. My two year old thinks its a toy and has been rolling it around the house and also standing/dancing on top of it. BUT this thing smells so horrible and I can NOT figure out how to fix that. Ive left it alone thinking it will air out, it has not. Ive sprayed tons of lemon pledge on it and it seems to make it worse. Im not trying to just soak it in fabreeze so fingers crossed. I purchased it two months ago and its still as smelly as day one. Other than that its awesome and shipped super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Justin K. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Gray tones in fiber but still beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Came sooner than expected in a huge box. It is not exactly as pictured. Other reviewers stated some gray in reeds and they are right. However this works into my decor nicely. Hollow inside and cannot use for storage. As others said it won’t support drinks as top is bumpy due to the natural weaving. A glass top would be gorgeous but expensive. I use a large serving tray permanently on top and it works perfectly holding drinks. I love it because it’s so different than other coffee tables. Highly recommend if you are okay with the gray tones.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Davis

customer_reviews.title: Much Nicer Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I waffled on buying this table for a year, but when I saw the prices rising and availability declining, I decided to try it, even though I wasn't sure it would work and knew it'd be a big pain to return. Well, i love it. It works great in my smallish living room and is plenty spacious enough for pretty and practical things on top. It's built much sturdier and heavier than I expected and the the bottom is lined with some heavy duty fabric. The weave is very tight and strong, nothing loose to worry about. I'm super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Coastal coffee table
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table, it is the perfect size and color that I as looking for. It is very nice and sturdy. I was looking for something that had a coastal look and this is just what I needed to add to my living room.
customer_reviews.author: C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Hope you like brown.
customer_reviews.text: Table arrived today. Sturdy, not too overly heavy but seems well made. I put a glass top on it and it looks nice. Downside - - IT'S BROWN. The picture makes it looked "white-washed" or shabby chic. NOPE - not even close. I even sent a photo of it to my mom when I ordered it and she came over today and said, "Whoa, it's a lot darker." So it's not just me. A previous poster mentioned a strong smell and if I sit super close to it, I can smell an odor. It's not horrible though. Just wish the picture color had been more close to the actual product. Brown. blech
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: I just received this today and I absolutely love it. I am giving it 5 stars on ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today and I absolutely love it. I am giving it 5 stars on its appearance and the fact that it is exactly as described in the picture. It is a beautiful piece. I was concerned that the color wouldn't be what I was looking for but it is actually better in person and matches spit on. I can't comment about the durability as of yet and if something happens I will update my review but so far I am totally in love.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Piccolomini

customer_reviews.title: So pretty and unique!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice coffee table! I got the last natural color I think, which is gorgeous. I like how I can choose to put glass or a tray or cushion in top and it seems very sturdy for how light weight it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kari L.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Coffee Tables
customer_reviews.text: We bought two black tables for our living room and are very pleased. I bought glass tops separately and they are very functional and beautiful. They may be a bit fragile and I'm not sure how they will wear over time. We love them more than tables costing hundreds more. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: dc cool j

customer_reviews.title: I really like this table
customer_reviews.text: I really like this table. I do need to order glass to go on top but its lightweight and slides easily on laminate or wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Great texture
customer_reviews.text: I love this ottoman! Very cute and adds nice texture to the room. It came belt out on one side and I wasn’t able to correct it. With kids, this will not last forever but cute for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Wisner

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and construction lovely natural color.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect exactly what I was looking for! Nice quality piece. Beautiful natural colors of natural bamboo with weathered grays. The bamboo is a nice heavy size not small like you see in most wicker furniture. Better than I expected. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about how much I love this table. Very beachy and so well made. I went to a Goodwill and found a glass top for this table which has made me love it even more! Buy this gorgeous table!
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Great looking
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our great room. Very good product for the price. Bought a round piece of glass and using it as a coffee table
customer_reviews.author: MDVC

customer_reviews.title: As it showed
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. A few of the woven canes push out of the weave patern. But otherwise good deal and delivery as expected
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Handsome Table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. I have an L shaped couch, so it worked beautifully as a coffee table. Love the color, too. Much sturdier than I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Zoolady

customer_reviews.title: Compliments given
customer_reviews.text: Great accent piece. Looking for a piece of glass for the top to dress it up.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Luv this piece. Doing an additional review because I continue to be asked by Amazon to do so. Plus, I wanted to add the pic so folks could have a better idea of its true size. Keep in mind, my ottoman is white.
customer_reviews.author: Fayvored1

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my new coffee table. The name says Ottoman, but I don't know anyone who would use it as a footrest. It's beautiful with varying colors throughout. Much larger than I thought it would be. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty but it is too hard to lay our feet on. Strictly a coffee table and not an ottoman for feet to be propped on. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SHANNON BLANKEN

customer_reviews.title: Nice ottoman/ coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Light weight but sturdy, perfect for our space. Nice color tones. We use it as a coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Easy to roll and move and holds a lot of magazines
customer_reviews.author: Martha Bailey

customer_reviews.title: good size, very functional in my studio
customer_reviews.text: Light, good size, very functional in my studio. But don't plan sitting on it.
customer_reviews.author: Irena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, casual style. Holding up well to lots of socked feet :) next to the family room sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie H. Dakters

customer_reviews.title: Not the color
customer_reviews.text: I love this ottoman which we will use as a coffee table in our sunroom. However the color is NOTHING like the picture. We purchased this one in Neutral, and it looks more like a gray. We will be spray painting it a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Piasio

customer_reviews.title: I feel it's a great table for the value
customer_reviews.text: I used this out on my covered patio and put a 36" round glass that I purchased at Pier 1. I feel it's a great table for the value. I wanted something coastal and this was a perfect choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: UPSguy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was the perfect size for our classroom reading center!
customer_reviews.author: lisa anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman looks great in our living room. Flexible color and allows for diversity. Pretty solid and holds a tray without tilting.
customer_reviews.author: deneica glenn

customer_reviews.title: ... read the reviews of what the color actually looked like, but mine came completely different than described
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews of what the color actually looked like,but mine came completely different than described. The one I received had an odd black color all over it. It reminds me of what wicker furniture looks like when you leave it outside for years and don't clean it. It was horrible, so disappointed. Thankfully Amazon is taking it back with no problems! I love Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: So many compliments
customer_reviews.text: IN LOVE with this table. I ordered the "dark brown" one and it has an almost weathered brown look to it. Obviously it was painted with a dark brown paint but it wasn't gooped on. It's perfect to what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Eliason Lamothe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife is happy with this, arrived in good shape and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: tjn

customer_reviews.title: I love this. I needed something not too tall to ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I needed something not too tall to use as a coffee table in my sitting room. Really nice diameter and height, looks nice. I get lots of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Beautiful color. Doesn't stink. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Mortensen

customer_reviews.title: It looks great but there is an odd smell coming from it
customer_reviews.text: It looks great but there is an odd smell coming from it. I've wiped it down numerous times but unfortunately, it still smells like something from a farm...
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition to my living room. A really nice natural tone! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: one for a client which was beautiful, but the second one
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these, one for a client which was beautiful, but the second one, that I ordered for myself, had several flaws in the construction! I was OK with it, but if this one had been for my client I would have sent it back!
customer_reviews.author: Shawnie T.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but is made of natural fibers that can break off.
customer_reviews.text: Nice find on Amazon, and cheaper than Joss and Main and Wayfair for same table.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I found this item it’s the perfect piece for my living room
customer_reviews.author: Neal Foley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for what I looked forever for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for what I looked forever for. The rectangle coffee table I had before was too big for the room and the sectional.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Norton

customer_reviews.title: I do like the piece although the coloring was not consistent natural ...
customer_reviews.text: I do like the piece although the coloring was not consistent natural white. There is some light yellow tones in sections. I will likely shoot a lite coat of natural paint to smooth the coloring.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I have bought in a long time. It's beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Mary Barlow

customer_reviews.title: I really like this, is not perfectly edged round
customer_reviews.text: I really like this, is not perfectly edged round, but I guess that's part of the rustic charm. I'm going to put a piece of glass on it so I can set a drinking glass on it. Safavieh has served our household well. Rugs and now this.
customer_reviews.author: DJH

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice but I don't know how durable it will be.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice, looks perfect in my beach home, quality is good for the price
customer_reviews.author: susan helmuth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece! Exactly what I was looking for. Good price. Timely shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Ottoman so much
customer_reviews.text: Love this Ottoman so much! Only thing is the wicker can break easily, like people stepping on the base when waking by it, but I'd still buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: gloria axiotis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this perfect coffee table for my Florida living room
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

product_meta.title: Safavieh Home Collection Ruxton Ottoman, Natural
product_meta.description: Bring the outdoors in with the woven rattan Safavieh Home Collection Ruxton Natural Ottoman, a transitional design that adapts to any decorating style from traditional to contemporary. With its low profile concave form and natural organic tone, Ruxton can be styled as a coffee table or cleared for use as extra seating or a footrest.
feature_bullets: The dark brown rattan wicker construction of this ottoman will give your home a chic accent
This ottoman works great at the foot of a bed, in a hallway or as extra seating anywhere
Perfect for the living room, den, bedroom or anywhere you want to add modern style
No assembly required, this ottoman measures 32.1" x 32.1" x 15.7"

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars31 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
